summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1201, for the improvement of Seventh Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Pike Street to Madison Street, by regrading, paving and curbing the same, and by making such extensions to the existing water and sewer systems as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 13281 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
